title: Bike Check: Wout van Aert’s Cervelo Aspero 5 for the UCI Gravel World Championships
content:
Van Aert's Cervelo Aspero-5 ahead of the UCI Gravel Worlds includes a Sram 2x drivetrain and immense saddle to bar drop.

Read the full article at Bike Check: Wout van Aert’s Cervelo Aspero 5 for the UCI Gravel World Championships on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
